timeline.message:
enable talking about float scalars

- error as flag (future: move out of class)
- eliminate redundant type enum
- preserve no free float behavior
- to/from spec now supports 'float'
use specific scalar builder for fast value factory
use generic scalar values for trivial cases

timeline.bodyText: We should probably also remove DoubleValueBuilder (which looks very similar to this).
timeline.author: arnej27959
